sense.def:
One's tone
je kakovost človekovega glasu, ki pokaže, kaj človek občuti ali misli.

seg.quote: ‘Very good,’ he said in an encouraging tone.

sense.def:
A tone
je eden izmed zvokov, ki jih slišimo, ko uporabljamo telefon, na primer zvok, ki pove, da je številka zasedena.

seg.quote: I'm getting the ringing tone, but there doesn't appear to be anyone at home.

sense.def:
The tone of a musical instrument or a singer's voice
je vrsta zvoka, ki ga ima glasbeni inštrument ali pevčev glas.

seg.quote: I wish I had a piano with a better tone.

sense.def:
The tone of a piece of writing
je slog besedila ali občutki, ki jih izraža pisec.

seg.quote: I was greatly offended by the tone of the article.

sense.def:
A tone
je tudi ena izmed svetlejših, temnejših ali močnejših različic iste barve.

seg.quote: You need a blue that is darker in tone.

sense.def:
To lower the tone of a place or conversation
pomeni, da kraj ali pogovor naredimo manj ugleden ali spoštovanja vreden.

seg.quote: He said the new people had lowered the tone of the neighbourhood.

sense.def:
To tone down something
pomeni nekaj, kar smo napisali, spremeniti tako, da je manj udarno, ostro ali žaljivo.

seg.quote: He advised me to tone down my letter.
